text: I Hate My Teenage Daughter is an American sitcom first aired on November 30, 2011 on Fox. On March 15, 2012, Fox announced they were removing I Hate My Teenage Daughter from the Tuesday night schedule, and that I Hate My Teenage Daughter would be replaced by reruns of Raising Hope, and that the remaining episodes would air in the Summer. == References == Category:2011 American television series debuts Category:American sitcoms Category:Fox television series Category:English-language television programs
title: I Hate My Teenage Daughter
